resources.string: The examples hosted under this section demonstrate the usage of Drop-In UI offered by the Mapbox Navigation SDK. Refer these examples if you want to use an in-built navigation experience, with the tools to replace and inject custom views as required by your app.

The examples hosted under this section demonstrate the usage of standalone components offered by the Mapbox Navigation SDK. Refer these examples if you want to build a fully custom navigation experience from scratch using the components provided.
